content.html: We don’t need any more commentators agonizing over why people are still (!!) wearing masks. It’s to avoid getting sick. Even if I’m 99.9% sure I’ll survive (not everyone is!), maybe I don’t wanna get sick? Or make others sick? Not wanting to get sick is actually very normal!
content.value:
We don’t need any more commentators agonizing over why people are still (!!) wearing masks.

It’s to avoid getting sick.

Even if I’m 99.9% sure I’ll survive (not everyone is!), maybe I don’t wanna get sick? Or make others sick?

Not wanting to get sick is actually very normal!
